uk.ac.shef.semweb
Class Extractor

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.shef.semweb.controller.Extractor

public class Extractor
extends Object

This class is the main class than handles the processing of an ontology and the writing of the rdf triples to the output. It also handles the creation of HTML pages.

Author:
Team BDM

Parameters:
